posts.post_title: Need just one more red HINDU....Sheckard
posts.post_content:
Hey guys,

Raw or Graded, any condition will be appreciated....so, I can complete this 12 card sub-set.

___________________________________________________________________________________
LOOKING for this T206 guy to complete my  EXCLUSIVE 12   red HINDU sub-set (12 subjects)

SHECKARD (glove)


You can contact me at...... [url]tedzan11@comcast.net[/url]

No PM's....please !

Thanks,

TED Z

But, it's been 1 1/2 months since and no luck with Sheckard.

Thanks for the encouraging words, good buddy.


TED Z
What type of money you looking to spend? I'm hitting a show at the end of next month that holds a ton of vintage and you never know may find it there. If I do ill pick it up for you.
